text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I decide I want to see a movie on the<n>weekend. At the
theater, I run into<n>someone else who has the same<n>idea.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh. Hello, Trainer. I gather you're alsohere to see Dawn of theUmamusume: The UntroddenChronicles.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm? Is that to say you haven't heard<n>of it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Dawn of the Umamusume is aseries of biographical films thatchronicles the careers of variousUmamusume racers.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'll admit, they jazz it up for the<n>screen, but they do an
excellent job<n>showing the racers' passions and<n>internal
struggles.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The series may hold new insights for<n>you as a trainer, too. I
recommend<n>watching it if you have a chance.
choice_data_list:
Ooh, I think I know what I'm watching today,
then.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah! I'm glad to hear it's piqued your<n>interest!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Why don't we watch it together?<n>Hehe, let me know your
thoughts<n>afterward!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The lights in the theater go down and<n>the movie begins.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The struggle of getting past an injury,<n>the miraculous
comeback...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Not everyone could make such a<n>splendid rebound, but I
think we all<n>can relate to the hardships she faced.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Symboli Rudolf said, the movie did<n>give me a lot of
insight as a trainer.
choice_data_list: I feel like I learned a lot!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haha, me too. I'm glad you liked the<n>film as much as I did.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm confident you'll like the other<n>titles in the series too. If
you want, I<n>can let you borrow my copies.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
There, do you see that poster? I knew<n>it was today! I've
been waiting ages<n>for this to come out!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Oh my gosh! And we get to see it onthe first day! ♪ Sigh... My heart'salready racing! I'm ready to swoon!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm? Academy students? Theirdedication to seeing Dawn of theUmamusume on opening day iscommendable.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
What a curious comment, though. I<n>didn't realize there was
a<n>swoonworthy aspect to the film...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking around the theater, I spot a<n>poster for another
movie that's<n>opening today—a romance title.
choice_data_list: Maybe they're talking about this movie?
Maybe they're talking about this movie?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm, let's see... First Love isSweeter than Carrot Cake?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Judging by the poster, it seems like a<n>tale of young love.
Could this be<n>what's popular amongst the<n>students?
choice_data_list: Wanna give this a go as well?
Wanna give this a go as well?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Uh... I don't mind, but why?
choice_data_list:
Having similar hobbies makes it easier to strike
up a conversation.

Having similar hobbies makes it easier to strike
up a conversation.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You have a point.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Having something in commonwould make for a fine conversation starter. And it's easierto relate to someone who shares yourinterests.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes... It's not just my personality<n>that's creating the gap
between<n>myself and everyone else. My<n>hobbies are also
on the stuffy side.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As they say, nothing ventured,<n>nothing gained. Naught will
come of<n>standing about and lamenting things.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Very well, let us purchase tickets! We<n>can see where this
romance goes!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The story features a couple who bond<n>over a certain cafe's
carrot cake.<n>They fall in love, and weather the ups<n>and
downs of their relationship.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the standout final scene, the<n>heroine grabs her crush as
he starts<n>to leave, and musters the courage to<n>tell him
how she feels.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Two films in one day. What an<n>indulgent weekend.
choice_data_list: Did you enjoy the romance movie?
Did you enjoy the romance movie?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, very much.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Up to the midpoint, the story flowed at<n>an idyllic pace as their
relationship<n>progressed, only to hurtle full-speed<n>toward
the climax for maximum<n>impact.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The plot had little in the way of<n>unexpected twists, but it
depicted the<n>protagonist's emotional journey in<n>great
detail.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Though not especially dramatic, the<n>script was well written.
Yes, I can<n>understand why the students would<n>like this
film.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While I agree with Symboli Rudolf's<n>review, I can't help but
feel it skews a<n>little technical.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm? I just said my thoughts on the<n>plot, so I'm afraid
you've lost me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, unless... You must mean the<n>protagonist's unique way
of<n>expressing her thoughts at the end.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: "It's barely autumn... and yet I'mfalling for you." Hehe... "Autumn" and"falling"... I hope she neverleaves his side.
choice_data_list:
I mean, did you find the characters relatable at
all?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Relatable? As in, did I see anything of<n>myself in the
protagonist's<n>yearnings?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid to say, I didn't even<n>consider watching a film
from such an<n>aspect.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I suppose one could put themself in<n>the protagonist's
shoes and<n>experience a vicarious romantic thrill...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Actually... that's how most people<n>would experience the
film, isn't it?<n>That must be why students tend to<n>enjoy
these kinds of stories.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I'll keep an eye out for<n>immersive theming. I'm
bound to pick<n>up something that helps bridge the<n>gap
between me and the others.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I've learned another lesson<n>thanks to you. Your point
of view is<n>truly enlightening.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After spending a fruitful day with<n>Symboli "The Emperor"
Rudolf, I feel<n>as though I understand her a little<n>better than
before.
